LSTM-CRF.from sentence: a bidirectional LSTM with a sequential conditional random layer above it (LSTM-CRF

chunks of input sentences.using: algorithm inspired by transition-based parsing with states represented by stack LSTMs

constructs and labels.from sentence: a new model that constructs and labels chunks of input sentences using an algorithm inspired by transition-based parsing with states represented by stack LSTMs (S-LSTM

use.from sentence: To capture orthographic sensitivity, we use character-based word representation model (Ling et al., 2015b) to capture distributional sensitivity, we combine these representations with distributional representations (Mikolov et al., 2013b).
